>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.YHaMYdptLi3fXfVH]{Bombard}

When you hit an enemy with a ranged attack or an attack with a weapon with the blast or explode special property, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to inflict a debilitating effect on that enemy for a number of rounds equal to your Strength bonus. You can choose to make the target @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.D8JvCEmOiWKe2UDx]{Deafened}, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed}, or off-target (see pages 275â€“277), or to reduce its speeds by half (to a minimum of 10 feet). The target can negate this effect with a successful Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half your soldier level + your Strength modifier).
